channel.title: Copilot Free on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Copilot Free on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Claude Sonnet 3.5 deprecated, Claude Haiku 4.5 available in Copilot Free
item.description:
GitHub deprecated Claude Sonnet 3.5 across all Copilot experiences on November 10, 2025, and made Claude Haiku 4.5 available in Copilot Free.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Auto model selection for Copilot in VS Code in public preview
item.description:
GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code has a new Auto model selection option in public preview that automatically picks the model for you via the model picker.

  • Source: GitHub
